title: DHS Tirunelveli Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 45 Staff Nurse and Other Posts
description: District Health Society (DHS) Tirunelveli has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 45 Staff Nurses, a Pharmacist, Health Inspectors, Lab Technician, and Other Positions. Those candidates who have qualified in the Diploma, GNM, B.Sc, B.Pharm, D.Pharm, 12th, DMLT, and 8th can grab this chance and apply for the DHS Tirunelveli Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to...
